credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Embroidered frontal
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Horizontal rectangle. The left side is shown. Sheaves, rising from acanthus calices, are intended to form there arcades, in which hang, above, nine festoons, and in the center, downwards, a circular medallion with a cross. Laterally a trophy of alter objects. Decorated border.
name: Drawing
